       	<item>
           <title><![CDATA[Sky Live: Thunder v Sirens]]></title>
           <description><![CDATA[Caroline O'Hanlon is ready to face her former team when Manchester Thunder play UWS Sirens on Monday.]]></description>

      	<item>
           <title><![CDATA[Wigan v Man City preview]]></title>
           <description><![CDATA[Wigan will aim to put the disappointment of successive League One defeats behind them when they host Manchester City in the FA Cup fifth round on Monday night (kick-off 7.55pm).]]></description>
           <link>http://www.skysports.com/football/wigan-vs-man-city/preview/388203</link>
           <pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 06:00:00 GMT</pubDate>
           <category>Preview</category>

      </item>
      	<item>
           <title><![CDATA[Windass hat-trick sends Rangers second]]></title>
           <description><![CDATA[Josh Windass scored a hat-trick as Rangers beat Hamilton 5-3 to move into second place in the Scottish Premiership table on goal difference. ]]></description>
           <link>http://www.skysports.com/football/hamilton-vs-rangers/report/376555</link>
           <pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 16:20:00 GMT</pubDate>
           <category>Report</category>

      </item>
      	<item>
           <title><![CDATA[Dhawan, Kumar lead India to T20I win]]></title>
           <description><![CDATA[Shikhar Dhawan struck 72 from 39 balls as India continued their dominance over South Africa in white-ball cricket with a comfortable 28-run win in the first T20I.]]></description>
           <link>http://www.skysports.com/live-scores/cricket/south-africa-v-india/19733/11256687/article</link>
           <pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 16:10:00 GMT</pubDate>
           <category>Report</category>
           <enclosure type="image/jpg" url="http://e2.365dm.com/18/02/128x67/skysports-shikhar-dhawan-india-t20-south-africa-the-wanderers-johannesburg_4234448.jpg?20180218150254" length="123456" />
      </item>
      	<item>
           <title><![CDATA[Straight to Aintree for Blaklion]]></title>
           <description><![CDATA[Nigel Twiston-Davies reports Blaklion to be none the worse for his exhausting run at Haydock and to be heading straight for the Randox Health Grand National.]]></description>
           <link>http://www.skysports.com/racing/news/12040/11256686/straight-to-randox-health-grand-national-at-aintree-for-blaklion</link>

      </item>
      	<item>
           <title><![CDATA[GB men's curlers defeat Italy]]></title>
           <description><![CDATA[Great Britain's men's curling team remain in the hunt for the semi-finals at the Winter Olympics after defeating Italy 7-6 on Sunday.]]></description>
           <link>http://www.skysports.com/olympics/news/12040/11256573/winter-olympics-gb-mens-curling-team-beats-italy-7-6</link>

           <category>News Story</category>

      </item>
      	<item>
           <title><![CDATA[WATCH: Spectacular bobsleigh crash]]></title>
           <description><![CDATA[The German pair of Nico Walther and Christian Poser dominated the opening heats of the two-man bobsleigh at the Winter Olympics, but they did not have it all their own way.]]></description>
           <link>http://www.skysports.com/olympics/news/12040/11256717/watch-bobsleigh-crash-overturns-sled-at-winter-olympics</link>
           <pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 16:11:00 GMT</pubDate>
           <category>News Story</category>

      </item>
      	<item>
           <title><![CDATA[WATCH: Tense Winter Olympics photo finish]]></title>
           <description><![CDATA[Martin Fourcade held on for victory and a gold medal by the finest of margins in the Winter Olympics men's biathlon 15km mass start.]]></description>
           <link>http://www.skysports.com/olympics/news/12040/11256617/watch-martin-fourcade-wins-winter-olympics-gold-in-tense-photo-finish</link>

      </item>
      	<item>
           <title><![CDATA[Trophy completes Federer supremacy]]></title>
           <description><![CDATA[Roger Federer celebrated the regaining of his world No 1 ranking by winning the Rotterdam Open on Sunday.]]></description>

      </item>
      	<item>
           <title><![CDATA[Ruta wins for Wellens and De La Cruz]]></title>
           <description><![CDATA[Tim Wellens managed to hold on to his lead and win Ruta del Sol after the closing time-trial, which was won by Team Sky's David de la Cruz.]]></description>
           <link>http://www.skysports.com/cycling/news/12040/11256619/david-de-la-cruz-wins-ruta-del-sol-time-trial-as-tim-wellens-takes-general-classification</link>

      	<item>
           <title><![CDATA[Groves: I always heal quickly]]></title>
           <description><![CDATA[George Groves is hopeful he will be fit enough to take part in the World Boxing Super Series final despite suffering a shoulder injury during his defeat of Chris Eubank Jr.]]></description>
           <link>http://www.skysports.com/boxing/news/12040/11256514/george-groves-hopes-his-shoulder-injury-isnt-going-to-be-a-big-problem</link>

      	<item>
           <title><![CDATA[Durcan announces retirement]]></title>
           <description><![CDATA[Classic-winning jockey Ted Durcan has announced his retirement after a highly-successful 25 years in the saddle.]]></description>
           <link>http://www.skysports.com/racing/news/12040/11256588/classic-winning-jockey-ted-durcan-announces-retirement</link>

      	<item>
           <title><![CDATA[McCarthy digs out Norwich's progress]]></title>
           <description><![CDATA[Ipswich boss Mick McCarthy has aimed a cheeky dig at Norwich City, criticising them for spending "£300m" only to be languishing in mid-table in the Sky Bet Championship.]]></description>
           <link>http://www.skysports.com/football/news/12040/11256653/mick-mccarthy-digs-out-norwich-for-their-spending-and-over-celebrating-equaliser-in-derby-draw</link>

      </item>
      	<item>
           <title><![CDATA[Mendis helps SL to T20 series win]]></title>
           <description><![CDATA[Sri Lanka completed a 2-0 T20 international series win over Bangladesh with a 75-run victory in the second and final game in Sylhet.]]></description>
           <link>http://www.skysports.com/live-scores/cricket/bangladesh-v-sri-lanka/21053/11256447/article</link>

      </item>
      	<item>
           <title><![CDATA[Russian athlete in doping probe]]></title>
           <description><![CDATA[A member of the Olympic Athletes from Russia team at the Winter Olympics is reportedly being investigated for a possible doping offence.]]></description>

      	<item>
           <title><![CDATA[Visser among six added by Scotland]]></title>

      	<item>
           <title><![CDATA[Last-gasp Klose stuns Ipswich]]></title>
